testing.approach: table-driven tests with testify/assert and testify/require
testing.mocking: testify/mock for interfaces with comprehensive assertions
testing.integration: database tests with proper setup/teardown and environment variables

implementation.architecture: hexagonal with clear separation between adapters and core domain
implementation.errorHandling: use pkg/errors for wrapping, explicit error return values, domain-specific error types
implementation.contextHandling: pass context.Context as first parameter to functions that perform I/O
implementation.concurrency: prefer goroutines and channels for concurrent operations
implementation.configuration: environment variables via godotenv, with sane defaults
implementation.logging: structured logging with zap, separate file and console loggers
